resources.string:
Cycle through the different exercise types with the uppermost dropdown menu. If your therapist has uploaded an exercise or exercises for you, you can cycle through it with the second dropdown menu


Please input your heart rate(bpm) and blood pressure(mmHg) and send it to your therapist before starting your physical exercise. If your heart rate and/or blood pressure is too high, please take a rest and check if your vital signs have improved before exercising


Only use the GET VITAL SIGNS FROM SMARTWATCH button if you have a compatible Smart Watch. Otherwise, you can manually input your vital signs
